publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2917 Irene Oldfather: Hungry for Success—That the Parliament acknowledges the Scottish Executive’s Hungry for Success initiative which aims to drive up the nutritional standards of school meals; recognises the benefits that this guidance will have on the diets of most schoolchildren; is aware, however, that, in a modern society, many children wish to pursue a vegetarian or vegan diet, and therefore considers that the Hungry for Success guidelines should be expanded to contain advice for schools on providing options for pupils who may choose to adhere to vegetarian or vegan diets.
S2M-2917 Hungry for Success (lodged on 3 June 2005) Maureen Macmillan*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-2917 Hungry for Success (lodged on 3 June 2005) Nora Radcliffe*
S2M-2917 Hungry for Success (lodged on 3 June 2005) John Swinburne*
S2M-2917 Hungry for Success (lodged on 3 June 2005) Marlyn Glen*
